name: Sunpetal Bloom (T1)
description: Bright petals that invigorate the body and sweeten brews. Hint: Often used for Cooking meals/feasts; Enchanting focus infusions. Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.

name: Rootcap Mushroom (T1)
description: A sturdy fungus that thickens mixtures and stabilizes pastes. Hint: Often used for Cooking stews; Scribing binding paste. Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.

name: Duskleaf Frond (T1)
description: A shadowy leaf that calms volatile magic and dulls glare. Hint: Often used for Scribing glyph inks; Enchanting wards. Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.

name: Bitterthorn Berry (T1)
description: Sharp berries used for stimulants, antidotes, and bitter tonics. Hint: Often used for Cooking restoratives; Enchanting resistance blends. Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.

name: Silvermint Sprig (T1)
description: Cooling mint that sharpens focus and steadies the hand. Hint: Often used for Scribing precise inks; Cooking travel rations. Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.
use: Scribing precise inks; Cooking travel rations

name: Moonshade Orchid (T1)
description: Rare orchid that resonates with protective and concealment magic. Hint: Often used for Tailoring magical stitching; Enchanting party charms. (Special find). Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.
use: Tailoring magical stitching; Enchanting party charms

name: Phoenixheart Seed (T1)
description: Mythic seed carrying stubborn life-force and restorative heat. Hint: Often used for Cooking grand banquets; Enchanting upgrade catalysts. (Special find). Commonly used in cooking, scribing inks, and enchantments.
use: Cooking grand banquets; Enchanting upgrade catalysts

name: Sturdy Hide (T1)
description: Tough hide suited for armor backing, straps, and reinforced cloth. Hint: Often used for Tailoring armor/outfits; Blacksmithing straps/linings. Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.

name: Razor Fang (T1)
description: A sharp trophy ideal for blade-tooth serrations and engraving tips. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing weapons; Scribing etching tools. Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.

name: Keen Eye (T1)
description: Preserved eye used in focus charms and divination-grade inks. Hint: Often used for Scribing seals/sigils; Enchanting foci. Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.

name: Wild Heart (T1)
description: Potent organ used to fortify meals and anchor protective charms. Hint: Often used for Cooking fortifying dishes; Enchanting party effects. Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.
use: Cooking fortifying dishes; Enchanting party effects

name: Feathered Wing (T1)
description: Light feathers used for quills, aerated cloth, and soft padding. Hint: Often used for Scribing quills; Tailoring cloaks. Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.

name: Chimera Horn (T1)
description: Rare horn that anchors transformative magic and stubborn bindings. Hint: Often used for Woodcrafter totems; Enchanting upgrades. (Special find). Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.

name: Dragon Gland (T1)
description: Exotic gland that fuels high-tier enchantments and intense feasts. Hint: Often used for Enchanting high-tier; Cooking grand banquets. (Special find). Used in blacksmithing, tailoring, woodcrafting, and cooking.

name: Deepvein Ore (T1)
description: Reliable ore for heavy plates, weapon cores, and durable rivets. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing heavy armor/weapons; Enchanting inlays. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Emberstone Chunk (T1)
description: Heat-bearing stone used to temper metal and fire-ward engravings. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing forging; Enchanting fire runes. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Frostsalt Crystal (T1)
description: Cold salt crystal for preservation and chill-ward mixtures. Hint: Often used for Cooking preservation; Enchanting cold wards. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Starcut Gem (T1)
description: Faceted gem that holds clean arcane edges and spell focus. Hint: Often used for Enchanting focus/off-hand; Scribing sigils. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Forge Flux (T1)
description: Refining powder that improves metal bonds and strong stitching rivets. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing refinement; Tailoring fittings. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Primal Shard (T1)
description: Volatile shard that amplifies enchantments when seated correctly. Hint: Often used for Scribing greater glyphs; Enchanting party effects. (Special find). Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.
use: Scribing greater glyphs; Enchanting party effects

name: Mythic Alloy (T1)
description: Rare alloy for truly exceptional arms, armor, and magical bases. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing magic bases; Tailoring magic fittings. (Special find). Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.
use: Blacksmithing magic bases; Tailoring magic fittings

description: Faceted gem that holds clean arcane edges and spell focus. Hint: Often used for Enchanting focus/off-hand; Scribing sigils. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Forge Flux (T3)
description: Refining powder that improves metal bonds and strong stitching rivets. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing refinement; Tailoring fittings. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Primal Shard (T3)
description: Volatile shard that amplifies enchantments when seated correctly. Hint: Often used for Scribing greater glyphs; Enchanting party effects. (Special find). Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.
use: Scribing greater glyphs; Enchanting party effects

name: Mythic Alloy (T3)
description: Rare alloy for truly exceptional arms, armor, and magical bases. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing magic bases; Tailoring magic fittings. (Special find). Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.
use: Blacksmithing magic bases; Tailoring magic fittings

name: Deepvein Ore (T4)
description: Reliable ore for heavy plates, weapon cores, and durable rivets. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing heavy armor/weapons; Enchanting inlays. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Emberstone Chunk (T4)
description: Heat-bearing stone used to temper metal and fire-ward engravings. Hint: Often used for Blacksmithing forging; Enchanting fire runes. Favored by blacksmiths, enchanters, and heavy armor crafters.

name: Aether Sand (T1)
description: Fine sand that clings to spellwork and accepts ink readily. Hint: Often used for Scribing ink catalyst; Enchanting binding. Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.

name: Mana Thread (T1)
description: Filament of raw mana used to stitch effects into cloth or metal. Hint: Often used for Tailoring magic threads; Enchanting upgrades. Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.

name: Rift Glass (T1)
description: Shimmering glass acting as a conduit for wards and lenses. Hint: Often used for Scribing wards; Enchanting armor wards. Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.

name: Spell Soot (T1)
description: Residue from spent spells used to darken, stabilize, and fix inks. Hint: Often used for Scribing scroll ink; Enchanting runes. Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.

name: Luminous Pearl (T1)
description: Bright pearl used in charms, foci, and scepter inlays. Hint: Often used for Enchanting focus; Woodcrafter scepters. Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.

name: Void Essence (T1)
description: Rare essence that bites into reality and hardens protective scripts. Hint: Often used for Scribing protection scrolls; Enchanting high-tier. (Special find). Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.

name: Astral Prism (T1)
description: Prismatic core that upgrades enchantments with minimal waste. Hint: Often used for Enchanting upgrades; Woodcrafter magic cores. (Special find). Essential for enchanting, scribing, and magical crafting.
